outline:
Nesar Markus Viehbeck
Catalogue for mdo volumes from Gnas gsar, which appear like one coherent set.
vol. 1 There is one volume mdo ka, but this looks a bit older, perhaps the oldest mss in collection, most importantly due to bigger string holes. Check content later.
vol 2:
895 Ns2.1 mdo Kha-N98 1b1-? 'phags pa byams pa lung bstand pa a r+ya me'e trai ? 'phags pa byams pa'i lung bstand pa rdzogs s+h+yo//
Title page damaged; ff. 5-6 missing; end of text missing.
115 Ns2.2 mdo Kha-N98 ?-10b2
'phags pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+h+yo //
Beginning of text missing
856 Ns2.3 mdo Kha-N98 10b2-11b2 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gi yongs su bsngo ba a r+ya badzra d+ha radza par ni ma na 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gi yongs su sngo ba rdzogs s+h+yo //
502 Ns2.4 mdo Kha-N98 11b2-36b1 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya sarba ta tha ga ta pu rba pra ni d+ha na bi she sha pi sta pa ra na ma mahr ya na su tra 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo brgyad brgya pa rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dz-i na myi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
In Lang this text has no colophon; also deviation in spelling the Sanskrit seems to indicate no close connection to Lang.
244 Ns2.5 mdo Kha-N98 36b1-49b1 'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya d+har ma ne tri na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho // // rgya kar gi mkhan po phrad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la s+tsogs pas / bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
200 Ns2.6 mdo Kha-N98 49b1-54b8 'phags pa 'jig rtend kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya lo ka nu pa rta nA nA ma ma hA ya na mu tra 'phags pa 'jig rtend kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo' / /s+dzogs+ho // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / /da na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban te ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
95 Ns2.7 mdo Kha-N98 55a1-296b1 'phags pa rgya cher rold pa zhes bya ba theg pa hcen po 'i mdo' a r+ya la li ta bi sta ra na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa rgya cher rold pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na sha la dang / mu no bar ma dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar rnying gis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa / rdzogs s+ho //
add later Colophon differs in its phrasing from Lang.
102 Ns2.8 mdo Kha-N98 296b2-? 'phags pa zung gi mdo chos kyi rnam grangs a rgya sang kh+had su dar ma ba rgya yA
add later
End missing, last f. 349.
vol. 3
216 Ns3.1 mdo Ga-N94 1b1?-65a9
rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'gyod pa gsal ba'i mdo' rdzogs+h+yo//
Beginning missing, text starts with f. 32.
552 Ns3.2 mdo Ga-N94 65a9-128a1 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo' sde 'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya su pra su pa na pra ba srod ta ma tre na dra rA dza na ma ma ha ya na su su tra gser 'od dam pa mdo' sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba / theg pa chen po'i mdo' rdzogs s+h+yo//
add later
133 Ns3.3 mdo Ga-N94 128a1-197a1 da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon tu zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo phrad d+yan pan na b+hud d+ha sam bu kha a pa sti sta sa ma d+hi na ma ma ha ya na su tra da ltar gi sangs rgyas mngon du zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
add later
131 Ns3.4 mdo Ga-N94 197a2-219b4 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya ta tha ga ta gnya na mu dra na mu sa d+hi ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'i ting nge 'dzin bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho //
Here order differs from Lang.
132 Ns3.5 mdo Ga-N94 219b4-284b7 'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'
'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba / theg pa chen po 'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
130 Ns3.6 mdo Ga-N94 284b7-306b5 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu 'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo ' ar+ya ma yo pa ma sa ma d+hi na na ma ha ma ya na su tra 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzos s+ho / rgya gar ki mkhan po su ren tra po de dang / zhu chen kyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
137 Ns3.7 mdo Ga-N94 306b5-314b2 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog pa dam pa A r+ya sa ma d+hi a tra ud ta ma 'phags pa ting nge 'dzind kyi mchog dam pa // //rdzogs s+ho //
129 Ns3.8 mdo Ga-N94 314b2-? 'phags pa rab tu zhi ba rab tu nges pa cho 'phrul gi ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya shan ta b+yi nis tsa yA pra ti ha r+ya na ma sA ma d+hi ma ha yA na su tra
add later
Tib. title varies slightly from Lang; end of text missing, last page f. 337.
Vol. 4
Ns4.1 mdo Nga-N70
The beginning is missing, but I assume it contains one more text.
136 Ns4.2 mdo Nga-N70 ?-58b8
'phags pa khye'u bzhi 'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya ba / theg pa chen po 'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho // // / /rgya gar gi 'khan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sde las s+tsogs pas bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan gtan la phab pa //
add later
127 Ns4.3 mdo Nga-N70 58b8-241b4 'phags pa chos thams cad rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo a r+ya sa rba d+ha rma sa b+ha ba sa ma t+wa bi ban tsi ta sa ma ti rA dza na ma ma ha yA na su tra 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa yi ting nge 'dzind kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po yi mdo // //rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shi len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de dar ma ta shi las bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
add later
add later
152 Ns4.4 mdo Nga-N70 241b5-mdo Ca-N35 27b8 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po yi mdo' A r+ya sa ga ra ma ti pa ri phrid tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'dus pa chen po le'u chos kyi rnam grangs las / 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya pa'i le'u ste / lnga pa //rdzogs s+ho // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / da na shi la dang / 'bu ta pra pa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te / skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
add later
add later End of volume missing, ends with f. 335; text continues in next volume - pages are missing, but textually this seems feasible.
Vol. 5
156 Ns5.1 mdo Ca-N35 27b8-76b1 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo' A r+ya A na ba tab ta na ga rA dza pa ri prid tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po' yi mdo // rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin myi tra dang da na shi la dang ban de ye shes sde las s+tsogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa //
153 Ns5.2 mdo Ca-N35 76b1-157b7 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' A r+ya pA ra na rdzA ri pra tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mchos zhus pa zhes pya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho // // // // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi dra dang / prad nya bar ma dang / lo tsa pa pan te ye shes sdes bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa //
add later
154 Ns5.3 mdo Ca-N35 157b7-165a1 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po 'i mdo' a r+ya sA gar nA ga ra dza pa ri pri tsa na ma ma ha ya na su dra 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po 'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho //
172 Ns5.4 mdo Ca-N35 165a2-169a8 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa zhes pya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya man 'dzu shri ri pa ri prid tsha na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po phrad nya bar ma dang zhu chen gyi lo tsa pa ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
163 Ns5.5 mdo Ca-N35 169a8-185b5 'phags pa rin cen dra pa can gyis zhus pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po 'i mdo' a r+ya rad na dzA li ba ri prid tsha na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags pa rin chen dra pa can gyis zhus pa / zhes pya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho // //rgya kar gyi mkhan po gnya' na gar pa dang lo tsa ba ban d+ha ye shes bsgyurd pa// //zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa /
158 Ns5.6 mdo Ca-N35 185b5-195a1 'phags pa tshangs pas zhus ba zhes pya pa theg pa chen po 'i mdo' A r+ya pra m+ha pa ri prid tshA na ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho // // / /rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / /zhu chen gi la tsa pa pan de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
151 Ns5.7 mdo Ca-N35 195a1-208b3 'phags pa spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus ba zhes bya pa theg pa chen po 'i mdo a r+ya pra ti p+hA na ma ti pa ri phrid tsha na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa spobs pa'i plo gros kyis zhus pa zhes pya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo //s+dzogs s+ho // // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po phrad gnya' par ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha pa ban de ye shes sde las s+tsogs pas / bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
150 Ns5.8 mdo Ca-N35 208b3-209a7 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa chos bdun pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya pa lo ki te sha ra pa ri prid tsha sab ta d+ha ma ka na ma ma hA yA na su tra 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa chos bdun pa zhes pya pa theg pa chen pa'i mdo rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gyi mkhan po di bang ka ra shri gnya' na dang / lo tsa pa dge slong dge pa'i blo gros kyis bsgyurd //
302 Ns5.9 mdo Ca-N35 209a7-210b7
'phags pa nye par 'khor gyis zhus pa zhes pya pa'i mdo rdzogs so //
The opening part of the work is missing, as it is in Lang and Ng. The work can be identified as rKTs302, D302, even though the title is entirely different.
149 Ns5.11 mdo Ca-N35 210b8-211b1 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes pya pa theg pa chen pa'i mdo' a r+yad mye tri pa ri phrid da na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
148 Ns5.11 mdo Ca-N35 211b1-303b5 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes pya pa theg pa chen po 'i mdo' a r+ya ga ga na gan dza pa ri prid tsha na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'dus pa chen po'i le'u las / 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba dzi la shi la dang / shi len dra 'o de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba / ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos //
add later
165 Ns5.12 mdo Ca-N35 303b5-308a3 'phags pa bde byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo' A r+ya k+sha mang kar pa ri phrid tsha na ma ma h+wa ya na su tra 'phags pa bde byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / rdzogs s+h+yo // //rgya gar gi 'khan po prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sde las+tsogs pas sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba //
155 Ns5.13 mdo Ca-N35 308a3-308b2 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya s+wa ga ra na ga rA dzA pa ri phri tshA nA ma ma ha yA na su tra 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+h+yo //
Short version, likely to be identical with D155.
154 Ns5.14 mdo Ca-N35 308b3-315a4 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya sa gar na ga ra dza ba ri prid tsa na ma ma ha na su tra 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo'// rdzogs s+ho //
Middle-length version, likely to be identical with D154.
342 Ns5.15 mdo Ca-N35 315a4-316b4 kun tu rgyu sen rings kyis zhus pa zhes bya pa'i mdo dI rga na kha pa ri prA dzA ka pa ri phrid tsha na ma su tra kun tu rgyu sen rings kyis zhus pa zhes pya pa'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho // rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra 'o de dang / zhu lan gyi lo tsa pa pan de ye shes sdes bsgyur //
164 Ns5.16 mdo Ca-N35 316b5-320b2 'phags pa khye'u rin cen zla pas zhus pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya rad na tsan dra da ra ka pa ri phrid tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa khye'u rin rchen zla pas zhus pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo // // rdzogs s+ho //
Check identification; title is slightly different from Derge and other version; further also this version is shorter than the Derge version. Text is also different, but could be related.
308 Ns5.17 mdo Ca-N35 320b2-329b3 tshe 'pho pa ji ltar 'gyur pa zhus pa'i mdo - 'chi 'pho pa ci ltar 'gyur pa bstan ba'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Skt.
170 Ns5.18 mdo Ca-N35 329b4-332b9 'phags pa pram ze dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes pya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya shri na ma trI prA m+hA nI pra ri phrid tsA nAM ma hA ya nA su tra 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya pa theg pa chen po'i mdo // //rdzogs s+ho //
171 Ns5.19 mdo Ca-N35 333a1- 'phags pa bgres mos zhus bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya ma ha la li ka pa ri prid tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra
This is pure speculation. Ff. 334-337 are missing, and it could well be that this text is contained, in an analog fashion to Lang.
159 Ns5.21 mdo Ca-N35 ?-350a6
'phags pa tshangs pas byin kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // // rdzogs s+ho // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po su ren tra bod de dang / prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las s+tsogs pas sgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa // //kra shis par gyurd cig // // zhus te dag go //
Beginning of text is among the missing ff.
Vol. 6 is missing in this set! For now, leave entries from Lang, but erase or replace later.
131 Lg6.1 mdo Cha-L46 1b1-26b6 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'i ting nge 'dzind zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya ta tha ga ta gnya na mu dra na mu sa d+hi ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind / zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen pa'i mdo'// // // // rdzogs so //
161 Lg6.2 mdo Cha-L46 27a1-67b4 'phags pa lha'i bu rab brtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya su ba kra da tsa ti de pi bud tra pa ri prad tsa na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo' //rdzogs s+ho //rgya kar gyi mkhan po prad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas bsgyur cing zhug te gtan la phab pa //
162 Lg6.3 mdo Cha-L46 67b4-72a6 'phags pa dpal dbyig gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo' a r+ya shri pa su ba ri prid tshA nA ma ma ha tra ya na su tra dphags pa dpal dbyig gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // // // //rdzogs s+ho // rgya gar gi mkhan po su ren 'dra bo de dang / prad ny+dza bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsho ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa
160 Lg6.4 mdo Cha-L46 72a7-154a8 'phags pa tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya ba shE tsin ti pra m+ha pa ri prid tsa ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // //rdzogs s+ho //
add later
134 Lg6.5 mdo Cha-L46 154a8-212a5 'phags pa sred myed kyi bus zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya sa rba pun na sa mun tsa ya sa mA 'd+hi na ma ma ha ya na su trA 'phags pa sred myed kyi bus zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' /rdzogs s+h+yo // //rgya gar gi 'khan po prad nya ba ra dang / shi lend dra bod de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes la tshogs pas sgyurd cing zhugs te /gtan la phab pa //
This work is also found in Hemis, Basgo, and Namgyal under the same Tibetan name. As an analysis of the text itself shows, it must be seen as a version of e.g. Derge 134, which also bears the same title in Sanskrit, but a different title in Tibetan.
166 Lg6.6 mdo Cha-L46 212a5-216a8 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a r+ya rva sta ba la na na ma ma ha yA na su tra 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // //rdzogs s+h+yo //
167 Lg6.7 mdo Cha-L46 216a8-254b7 'phags pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo a r+ya pi kur pa ni rA dza ba ri prid tsa na ma ma ha yA na su tra 'phags pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal pos zhus pas zhes bya ba theg pa chen po mdo' // //rdzogs s+h+yo //rgya kar gi mkhan po phrad nya par ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la 'bab pa / zhu chen po legs par byas so //
157 Lg6.8 mdo Cha-L46 254b7-327b2 'phags pa myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya dru ma ki na na ra ra dza pa ri phrid tsa na ma ma hA ya na su tra 'phags pa myi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho
224 Lg6.9 mdo Cha-L46 327b2-338b6 'phags pa lhag ba'i bsam pa brtan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo' a r+ya dri D+ha d+ha sha ya pa ni parta' na mA ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam ba brtan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba'i mdo' // rdzogs s+ho//rgya kar gyi mkhan po su len dra bo de dang prad nya bar ma dang zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban de ye shes sde las stsogs pas sgyur cing zhus te rtan la pab pa //
184 Lg6.10 mdo Cha-L46 338b6-348a3 'phags pa byang chub seMs dpa' spyod ba bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya bo di sad tva tsa r+ya na ri de sha na na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa / byang chub sems dpa'i / spyod ba bstand pa zhes / bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi 'khan po // //'dzi na myi tra dang / phrad nya par ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba / ban te ye shes sde / las stsogs pas / bsgyur cing / gtan la pab pa / // //rdzogs s+ho //
Vol. 7
146 Ns6.? mdo Cha-? ?-Ja-N8 44b1
'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la / rnam par 'phruld pa bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi 'khan po prad nya par ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyurd cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
add later Text continues from previous volume; this however is missing from the collection.
224 Ns7.1 mdo Ja-N8 44b1-54b3 'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo a r+ya dri D+ha a d+ha sha ya pa ni brto na mA ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa'-i lhag pa'i bsam ba brtan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba'i mdo / /rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi 'khan po su len dra bo de dang / phrad nya bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las s+tsogs pas sgyurd cing / zhus te rtan la phab pa //

637 Ns30.4 mdo A-N2 26b1-27a2 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa'i gzungs a r+ya me tri ngny+ya na ma d+ha ra ni 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so //
680 Ns30.5 mdo A-N2 27a2-311a8 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhim mo 'i rgyal po a rgya a mo g+ha pA sha kal pa ra tsa 'phags pa' don yod pa'i / zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo 'i rgyal po // //rdzogs s+ho // // // // bam po sum bcu pa'o // //'di las myi bzhugs so //
add later
610 Ns30.6 mdo A-N2 311a8-315b6 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs a r+ya sab tra ba da te kA nA ma he ra ni 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs // //rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi 'khan po bi dri r+ye sang ha dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba / rgya gar gyi mkhan po yi shu ta / sang ha / ban de ye shes sdes sgyur //
521 Ns30.7 mdo A-N2 315b6-317a8 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba a r+ya gnya na skra na ma da ra ni sa rba ga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba / rdzogs s+ho //
F. 316 is missing.
735 Ns30.8 mdo A-N2 317a8-317b8 dpal chen mo 'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa ma ha sri na ma d+wang da sha ka 'phags pa dpal chen mo 'i / mtshan bcu gnyis pa / /rdzogs s+ho //
648 Ns30.9 mdo A-N2 318a1-321a3 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya d+ha ma sa gAr na ma ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'i mdo // // rdzogs s+ho //
730 Ns30.10 mdo A-N2 321a3-321b3 'phags pa ri 'grod ma lo ma 'i gzungs a r+ya pa rna sha pa ri na ma ha d+ha ra ni 'phags pa ri khrod ma lo ma gyon pa'i gzungs / rdzogs s+ho //
507 Ns30.11 mdo A-N2 321b3-? byang chub kyi snying po 'i rgyand ces pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga bo d+hi man da a lang kA ra nA mA d+ha ra ni u pa tsa yA byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho //
This version differs from the Derge version. The end of the volume is missing; breaks off after f. 339; last folio is probably from another text, perhaps rKTs 680.
